title: Plan Processing Plant Shutdown
description: A shutdown planner develops a detailed plan for a major maintenance shutdown of the entire processing plant.

tasks.description: Compile the full scope of work for the shutdown, including all maintenance jobs, inspections, and capital tie-ins.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive work list with thousands of tasks is created.

tasks.description: Develop a detailed, integrated schedule for all shutdown activities, identifying the critical path.
tasks.expected_outcome: A Gantt chart is created showing the critical path for the 10-day shutdown.

tasks.description: Book all necessary resources, including contractors, cranes, and specialty tools, for the planned dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: All required external resources are booked and confirmed.
